name: Stand Out – Text Emphasis
author: Ryan Pilling

sections.description:
Catch the eye and draw attention to your words with distinct styles. Realistic “hand-drawn” highlighter effects and other formatting methods.

You are welcome to add comments and questions into the Plugin Support page. I will be as active as possible with responses.
sections.installation:
1. Upload and activate the ‘Stand Out’ plugin.
  2. You can add [standout] tags around any text. Don’t forget to close them. [/standout]
  3. Alternatively, you can use a drop down menu in the text editor to pick your effects.
  4. Your words will be emphasized in your posts.
sections.faq:
What emphasis styles and effects are included?

We’re getting started with a hand-drawn highlighter effect and growing from there.

short_description: Add highlights and other text effects to put emphasis on your writing.
